mapper.insert: insert into EVALUATION_RATING ( M_ID , CARD_NO , CONTENT , E_RATING ) select #{mId}, #{cardNo}, #{content}, #{eRating} from dual where not exists ( select M_ID, CARD_NO from EVALUATION_RATING where CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND M_ID = #{mId} AND deleted = 0 )
mapper.select: select e.E_RATING_NO , e.M_ID , e.CARD_NO , e.E_RATING , e.CONTENT , e.REG_DATE , sum(ifnull(el.ER_LIKED, 0)) E_LIKED_SUM from EVALUATION_RATING e left outer join EVALUATION_RATING_LIKED el on e.E_RATING_NO = el.E_RATING_NO where e.CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND e.M_ID = #{mId} AND e.deleted = 0 group by e.E_RATING_NO
select sum(ER_LIKED) from EVALUATION_RATING_LIKED where E_RATING_LIKED_NO = #{ eRatingLikedNo } AND deleted = 0

select e.E_RATING_NO , e.CARD_NO , e.M_ID , e.CONTENT , e.REG_DATE , e.E_RATING , e.deleted , sum(ifnull(el.ER_LIKED, 0)) E_LIKED_SUM , sum(ifnull((select el.LIKED_M_ID = #{mId}), 0)) M_LIKED from EVALUATION_RATING e left outer join EVALUATION_RATING_LIKED el on e.E_RATING_NO = el.E_RATING_NO where e.CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND e.deleted = 0 AND e.M_ID != #{mId} group by e.E_RATING_NO order by E_LIKED_SUM DESC, e.REG_DATE DESC limit #{articleStartNo}, #{limit}

select e.E_RATING_NO , e.CARD_NO , e.M_ID , e.CONTENT , e.REG_DATE , e.E_RATING , e.deleted , sum(ifnull(el.ER_LIKED, 0)) E_LIKED_SUM , sum(ifnull((select el.LIKED_M_ID = #{mId}), 0)) M_LIKED from EVALUATION_RATING e left outer join EVALUATION_RATING_LIKED el on e.E_RATING_NO = el.E_RATING_NO where e.CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND e.deleted = 0 group by e.E_RATING_NO order by E_LIKED_SUM DESC, e.REG_DATE DESC limit #{limit}
select C_RATING from CARD_DB where CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND deleted = 0
select E_COMMENT_NO , M_ID , CARD_NO , CONTENT , REG_DATE , deleted from EVALUATION_COMMENT where CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND deleted = 0 order by REG_DATE DESC
select CARD_NO , SITE_URL , C_POINT , REG_DATE , DISCOVERER , C_NAME , C_RATING , C_LEVEL from CARD_DB where CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND deleted = 0

select distinct m.M_Id, m.M_POINT, m.M_Level, f.F_NAME, f.F_POINT, max(myc.REG_DATE) REG_DATE, ft.FT_NAME1, ft.FT_NAME2, ft.FT_NAME3 from FOLDER f, MEMBER m, MY_CARD myc, CARD_DB c, F_TAG ft where f.M_ID = m.M_ID AND f.F_NO = myc.F_NO AND myc.CARD_NO = c.CARD_NO AND c.CARD_NO = #{ cardNo } AND ft.F_NO = f.F_NO AND f.SECRET = 1
AND USERTYPE = 0 AND f.deleted = 0 AND m.deleted = 0 AND myc.deleted = 0 AND c.deleted = 0 group by m.M_ID, f.F_NAME, f.F_POINT, f.F_NO order by f.F_POINT DESC, m.M_POINT DESC-- , REG_DATE DESC limit 3

select mt.MYC_NAME as bestTagName, max(mt.REG_DATE) as regDate, count(MYC_NAME) as tagCount from MYC_TAG mt, MY_CARD myc where mt.MYC_NO = myc.MYC_NO AND ${columnName} = #{valueNo} AND myc.deleted = 0 group by mt.MYC_NAME order by tagCount DESC, regDate DESC limit 3
mapper.update: update CARD_DB set C_RATING = ( select case when count(CARD_NO) >= #{minArticleNo} then round(avg(E_RATING), 1) else -1 end from EVALUATION_RATING where CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND deleted = 0 ) where CARD_NO = #{cardNo}
mapper.select: select C_NAME, SITE_URL, IMG_SRC, URLDESC from CARD_DB where CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND deleted = 0
